title: Counting on Fruit with Nerdel
description: Meet the loveable and adoreable Nerdel, a little alien visitor from the planet Zendel. Nerdel has arrived on the planet Earth on an adventure and is learning all about nutrition and fitness from his new friends and family. You can Count on Fruit with Nerdel and learn about counting in this rhyming tale full of fun and love. Learn basic numbers in English and Spanish, sequencing, shapes and more!
author: Robin Kesselman
